name: Hypnagogia Demo (Oculus Rift)
description:
Hypnagogia is the experience of the transitional state from wakefulness to sleep. Mental phenomena that occur during this "threshold consciousness" phase include lucid dreaming, hallucinations, and sleep paralysis.In this state, the only thing you can do is wait and endure. The game is mainly made to be used with the Oculus Rift, but a version for normal screen is available.

You can follow the project on IndieDB
